expectation: Diagnose patient illnesses accurately based on symptoms and tests
situation: A patient with symptoms of the common cold has come in for a routine check-up.

expectation: Diagnose patient illnesses accurately based on symptoms and tests
situation: A patient has a combination of unusual symptoms that are not immediately linked to a single known illness.

expectation: Diagnose patient illnesses accurately based on symptoms and tests
situation: A patient has arrived at the emergency room with severe, life-threatening symptoms of an unknown illness.

expectation: Communicate clearly and empathetically with patients and their families
situation: A patient is at a routine check-up and has general questions about their health.

expectation: Communicate clearly and empathetically with patients and their families
situation: A patient has received a new diagnosis for a chronic condition and has many questions about managing it.

expectation: Communicate clearly and empathetically with patients and their families
situation: The doctor must deliver a difficult and serious diagnosis to a patient's family, who are understandably very upset.
A patient with a common illness like strep throat has come to the clinic for a check-up.
A patient with a chronic autoimmune disease requires a very specific and ongoing treatment plan.
A patient has arrived at the emergency room with a severe, fast-spreading infection that requires an immediate and powerful antibiotic treatment.
